content.description: The Chode. 2 ways to start this beast. Easier start to the left in a big crack, then immediately move right across cool pockets until you can gain the seam features up and right. Optional start to the right on a small but deep pocket for your right hand above head height, put your feet on some horrible holds and dyno to the left hand pocket. The dyno versions is a bit harder. This route is action packed. The clips are hard, every move is hard. This would have been a great boulder problem if the landing was safe. Anchor is in a location so that top roping the route is easy.
content.protection: 3 bolts plus a chain anchor. Recommend stick clipping the first bolt.
content.location: Walk up the hill to the north and then wrap around to the south. There is a large ledge that you walk out on to start this climb.
